official_title: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Phase 1b/2 Study of the Safety and Efficacy of TL-895 Combined With KRT-232 in Patients With Relapsed/Refractory (R/R) FLT3+ Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML)
inclusion_criteria:
* TP53 wildtype AML
* Relapsed/Refractory to at least one prior therapy, one of which must have included a FLT-3 inhibitor
* FLT3 mutation (FLT3-TKD or FLT3-ITD)
* ECOG 0-2
* Adequate hematologic, hepatic, and renal functions
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* AML subtype 3
* Prior treatment with MDM2 antagonist therapies
* Eligible for HSCT
